info.title: BACOWR API
info.description: BacklinkContent Engine - AI-powered content generation for SEO

get.description: Health check endpoint.
Root endpoint with API information.

post.description:
Create a new content generation job.

The job will be processed asynchronously in the background.
Use GET /jobs/{job_id} to check status and retrieve results.

get.description:
List jobs for current user with pagination.

Optional filtering by status.

Get detailed job information.

Includes article text, QC report, execution log, and metrics.

delete.description:
Delete a job.

Only pending or completed jobs can be deleted.

get.description:
Get job article text.

Returns plain text Markdown article.

List backlinks with pagination and filtering.

Filters:
- publisher_domain: Filter by publisher domain
- category: Filter by category
- language: Filter by language
- search: Search in anchor text, publisher domain, or target URL

post.description:
Bulk import backlinks.

Maximum 1000 backlinks per request.

get.description:
Get statistics about backlinks.

Returns:
- Total count
- Breakdown by publisher, category, language
- Average domain/page authority
- Total traffic estimate
Get a specific backlink by ID.

post.description:
Create a new batch from completed jobs.

Args:
    batch_data: Batch creation data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Created batch

Raises:
    400: If jobs invalid or not completed
    404: If jobs not found

get.description:
List all batches for current user.

Args:
    status_filter: Optional status filter
    limit: Max batches to return
    offset: Offset for pagination
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of batches

schema.title: Response List Batches Api V1 Batches Get

get.description:
Get batch details with all items.

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Batch details with items

Raises:
    404: If batch not found

Get batch items with filtering.

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    review_status: Filter by review status
    min_qc_score: Minimum QC score filter
    max_qc_score: Maximum QC score filter
    limit: Max items to return
    offset: Offset for pagination
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of batch items

Raises:
    404: If batch not found

schema.title: Response Get Batch Items Api V1 Batches  Batch Id  Items Get

post.description:
Review a batch item (approve, reject, or request regeneration).

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    item_id: Item ID
    decision: Review decision
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Updated batch item

Raises:
    400: If item already reviewed or invalid decision
    404: If batch or item not found

Execute regeneration for a batch item.

Creates a new job with the same parameters and updates the batch item.

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    item_id: Item ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Updated batch item with new job

Raises:
    400: If item not in needs_regeneration status
    404: If batch or item not found

Export all approved items from a batch.

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    export_format: Export format (json or csv)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Export metadata with file path

Raises:
    400: If no approved items
    404: If batch not found

get.description:
Get batch statistics and analytics.

Args:
    batch_id: Batch ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Batch statistics

Raises:
    404: If batch not found

post.description:
Estimate cost for job(s).

Provides cost estimate based on provider, strategy, and number of jobs.

get.description:
Get analytics for user's jobs.

Args:
    days: Number of days to include in analytics (default: 30)

Returns:
    Analytics including job counts, costs, success rates, etc.

Get list of available LLM providers.

Returns provider information including models and features.

post.description:
Create a new user (Admin only).

Generates an API key automatically.

get.description: List all users (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users Get

get.description: Get current user information.
Get user by ID (Admin only).

delete.description:
Delete a user (Admin only).

This will cascade delete all jobs and backlinks associated with the user.

patch.description:
Deactivate a user (Admin only).

Deactivated users cannot access the API.

post.description:
Regenerate API key for a user (Admin only).

Warning: This will invalidate the old API key.

get.description:
List audit logs (admin only).

Args:
    limit: Max results
    offset: Offset for pagination
    action: Filter by action
    user_id: Filter by user
    resource_type: Filter by resource type
    status_filter: Filter by status
    hours: Look back N hours
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of audit logs

schema.title: Response List Audit Logs Api V1 Audit Logs Get

get.description:
Get detailed audit log entry (admin only).

Args:
    log_id: Audit log ID
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Detailed audit log

Raises:
    404: If log not found

Get audit trail for specific user (admin only).

Args:
    user_id: User ID
    limit: Max results
    offset: Offset for pagination
    action: Filter by action
    hours: Look back N hours
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of user's audit logs

schema.title: Response Get User Activity Api V1 Audit Users  User Id  Activity Get

get.description:
Get audit history for specific resource (admin only).

Args:
    resource_type: Resource type (job, batch, etc.)
    resource_id: Resource ID
    limit: Max results
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of resource audit logs

schema.title: Response Get Resource History Api V1 Audit Resources  Resource Type   Resource Id  History Get

get.description:
Get recent security events (admin only).

Args:
    hours: Look back N hours
    limit: Max results
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of security event audit logs

schema.title: Response Get Security Events Api V1 Audit Security Events Get

get.description:
Get recent failed actions (admin only).

Args:
    hours: Look back N hours
    limit: Max results
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    List of failed action audit logs

schema.title: Response Get Failed Actions Api V1 Audit Failed Actions Get

get.description:
Get audit statistics (admin only).

Args:
    hours: Look back N hours
    current_user: Current admin user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Audit statistics

AuditLogDetailResponse.title: AuditLogDetailResponse
AuditLogDetailResponse.description: Detailed audit log with request/response data.

BatchDetailResponse.title: BatchDetailResponse
BatchDetailResponse.description: Schema for detailed batch response with items.

BatchItemResponse.title: BatchItemResponse
BatchItemResponse.description: Schema for batch review item response.

JobCreate.title: JobCreate
JobCreate.description: Schema for creating a new job.

JobDetailResponse.title: JobDetailResponse
JobDetailResponse.description: Schema for detailed job response with all data.
